name: homeassistant
description: Control smart home devices via Home Assistant API. Supports lights, switches, covers, climate, scenes, and scripts. Natural language commands like 'turn on living room lights' or 'set thermostat to 22 degrees'.

action.description: Action to perform: on, off, brightness, rgb, temperature, scene, script

entity.description: Device name or entity ID (e.g., 'living room lights', 'bedroom AC')

value.description: Optional value for brightness (0-100), color (#RRGGBB), or temperature
